page.title: 19RIVER DANE
page.content: The source of the river Dane is Axe Edge Moor and the river ends up as a tributary of the river Weaver.on its journey,the river Dane is used in many ways.At Dane Bridge the river Dane is used as a trout farm.Most of the river Dane curves round the trout farm while the rest goes through a man made channel to keep the trout alive.It is also used to feed the Caldon Canal.Part of it goes through Rudyard Reservoir and into the canal.In Congleton town,the river Dane is used for boating.Lots of people go there.
